ValidationRule.description: To stop having the status 'Not Taken' changed into 'Accepted'
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED(Status), ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status),"Not Taken"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Accepted"), $Profile.Name<>"System Administrator" )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Not Taken' status cannot be changed with Accepted. Either Reject this quote or create a new one.
